# New Website Announcement

Have you checked out our new website yet?

We’re excited to announce that the new MEDS website has been launched, built from the ground up with a fresh look!

<center>

<https://sites.google.com/ualberta.ca/meds>

</center>

The new website provides most recent information on the MEDS program, including our graduate courses, program-related news, and many resources for current and prospective students.
